General.Name: Lucky Harvest
General.Description: Lucky Harvest Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of precision stamping dies and structural metal parts in China. Its products include progressive, transfer, and multiset tools for production of automobile metal structural parts and components; auto parts systems, such as body, battery, electronic, seating, new energy, and heat exchanger systems; CNC sheet metal parts for application in server cases, including communication equipment functional plug boxes or cabinets, charging pile shells, aerospace, and medical equipment, as well as office and electronic equipment structural parts comprising printers, copiers, projectors, etc.; and other products, including aviation products, and aviation and power distribution cabinets. Lucky Harvest Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is based in Dongguan City, China.

2.Name: Mr. Zhenhai  Chen
2.Title: Sec. of the Board & Deputy GM
